definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)

sentences.english: I stick to my usual, one bottle of well-chilled Tsingtao beer.
sentences.chinese: 老規矩，來一瓶冰鎮青島啤酒。

sentences.english: I want to be on a tropical paradise being served pina coladas all day long.
sentences.chinese: 我要到一個熱帶樂園，整天喝冰鎮果汁朗姆酒。

sentences.english: A chill that had nothing to do with the iced champagne was stealing through Harry's chest.
sentences.chinese: 一股與冰鎮香檳酒無關的寒意穿過哈利的臉膛。

sentences.english: She pauses to sip a frothy iced coffee from a plastic tumbler.
sentences.chinese: 她停下來呷了一口塑料杯裏浮滿泡沫的冰鎮咖啡。

sentences.english: Cold chocolate milk tastes pretty refreshing after a run.
sentences.chinese: 跑步之後喝冰鎮巧克力牛奶相當地提神。

sentences.english: I'd like 2 bottles of beer chilled with ice, please.
sentences.chinese: 麻煩給我來兩瓶冰鎮啤酒。

sentences.english: Put the whisky in the ice box to chill.
sentences.chinese: 把威士忌酒放在冰盒裏冰鎮。

sentences.english: Even an iced tea drink can help in detoxifying the body.
sentences.chinese: 甚至一冰鎮茶飲料可以幫助在排毒身體。

sentences.english: Try to sip iced or hot herbal teas prepared with minimal amount of sugar throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 喝冰鎮的或者熱的花草茶，裏面儘量少放糖。

sentences.english: A customer enjoys a cold beer inside the Nevada Club on Main St. in Grass Valley.
sentences.chinese: 顧客在享受冰鎮啤酒，內華達俱樂部內，草谷鎮主街。

sentences.english: Perfect as an aperitif and with hors -d'oeuvres. Serve well chilled.
sentences.chinese: 作爲開胃酒或搭配乾果，冰鎮後飲用更佳。

sentences.english: She ask for an orange sorbed .
Drink water scented with fennel , sherbet.
sentences.chinese: 喝那加了茴香的水，冰鎮果汁。

sentences.english: The taste of an ice-cold Hefeweizen.
sentences.chinese: 一杯冰鎮啤酒的絕妙滋味。

sentences.english: Use up that last bit of juice by freezing it in ice-cube trays.
sentences.chinese: 用盡最後一丁點兒的果汁，冰鎮在冰格里。

sentences.english: Young people, even in deepest winter wheat also prefer iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人即使在寒冬臘月也偏愛冰鎮麥茶。

definition: red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
variant of 熱乎乎|热乎乎[re4 hu1 hu1]
